name: I-Space
description: I-Space is a computer game that helps people of all ages to learn about the characteristics of the planets, orbits, origin, temperature, structures, atmosphere, distance from the sun, of each planet, and space as a whole, while traveling long distances in the space and visiting all 8 planets. Travelers (players) will learn and have fun while driving the spaceship, visiting the planets, opening the boxes, and passing the tests. I-Space is an application of gamification that applies educational approach and conveys real information in attractive designs and colors that can motivate curiosity in people - especially children - about space and the Solar System.
